description: Tex's deep Southern molasses voice may lull you into a false sense of familiarity, but- look alive!- this country boy has a few unexpected surprises in stow for you. Having left his native Texas, he finds himself all the way out west, soaking in the pool as the California sun soaks his corn-fed body. Solid and built like a brick, Tex slips out of his swimming trunks and unfurls his cock, stroking it as it drip dries in the afternoon heat. Standing naked poolside, he turns to expose a meaty ass, which he gives a hearty smack before laying down, extending and flexing his muscles, then working the head til its blushing red and ready to fire, Tex shoots his pistol and lets his payload spill out all over his ripped stomach, a messy but hard-earned ending.Enjoy!
title: Tex
